item.title: How to Use Keepass as a Two-Factor Authentication App (without Plugins)
item.description: KeePass has built-in functionality to act in place of Google Authenticator or other two-factor authentication apps on your phone. The feature is fairly obscure and requires specific String fields to be set on a Password Entry. This feature is best suited for power users. Non-technical users should strongly consider using a user-friendly KeePass plugin instead. Configuring KeePass Start by creating a new Password Entry. Fill in the Title, User name, and other basic fields as desired.
